UI/UX Designer based in London.

With a varied background in customer service, and 4 years design experience in Fintech, I am now on the lookout for a more varied role and change of industry. I am open to what that industry may look like, but keen to explore more impactful opportunities.

To improve my skillset I am currently completing a part-time Service Design course.
